api_list.name: Get country's hashtags
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://twitter-hashtags.p.rapidapi.com/getRegionalTrending/argentina"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "twitter-hashtags.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://twitter-hashtags.p.rapidapi.com/getRegionalTrending/{country}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "twitter-hashtags.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get worldwide hashtags
api_list.description: Returns a list of all recent hashtags worldwide
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://twitter-hashtags.p.rapidapi.com/getTrending"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "twitter-hashtags.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://twitter-hashtags.p.rapidapi.com/getTrending"

headers = {
